Primary Contact: Marjorie Rutherford, Founder; Phone: 250.860.2572; Email: pap12@shaw.ca
Service Details: - Provides the opportunity for hospital patients and residents of care facilities to get together with friendly pets and their owners- Visits from volunteers and their pets provide warmth and companionship, the chance to talk and reminisce about the past, and the simple pleasures of interacting with a pet
Eligibility: Our clients are those currently in a medical facility, and range in age from toddler to senior
